snippet: Former Justice Joan Orie Melvin of State Supreme Court avoided prison time on Tuesday for her campaign corruption conviction but was ordered to send a letter of apology to every judge in the state.
abstract: Former Justice Joan Orie Melvin of Pennsylvania State Supreme Court avoids prison time for her campaign corruption conviction but is ordered to send letter of apology to every judge in the state for abusing her office.
